import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import CardTable from "components/Cards/CardTable.js"; export default function Schedules() { const history = useHistory(); const [showForm, setShowForm] = useState(false); const [editingSchedule, setEditingSchedule] = useState(null); const [scheduleData, setScheduleData] = useState({ express: "", bus: "", date: "", departureTime: "", arrivalTime: "", availableSeats: "", price: "", status: "active" }); const [scheduleList, setScheduleList] = useState([ { id: 1, express: "Kigali - Huye", bus: "BUS-001", date: "2024-01-15", departureTime: "08:00", arrivalTime: "10:30", availableSeats: "45", price: "2500", status: "active" }, { id: 2, express: "Kigali - Musanze", bus: "BUS-002", date: "2024-01-15", departureTime: "10:00", arrivalTime: "12:00", availableSeats: "38", price: "3000", status: "active" }, { id: 3, express: "Kigali - Kibuye", bus: "BUS-003", date: "2024-01-15", departureTime: "12:00", arrivalTime: "14:30", availableSeats: "42", price: "2800", status: "active" }, { id: 4, express: "Kigali - Rusizi", bus: "BUS-004", date: "2024-01-15", departureTime: "14:00", arrivalTime: "17:00", availableSeats: "35", price: "3200", status: "cancelled" } ]); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setScheduleData({ ...scheduleData, [name]: value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (editingSchedule) { setScheduleList(scheduleList.map(item => item.id === editingSchedule.id ? { ...scheduleData, id: item.id } : item )); setEditingSchedule(null); } else { setScheduleList([...scheduleList, { ...scheduleData, id: Date.now() }]); } setScheduleData({ express: "", bus: "", date: "", departureTime: "", arrivalTime: "", availableSeats: "", price: "", status: "active" }); setShowForm(false); }; const handleEdit = (schedule) => { setEditingSchedule(schedule); setScheduleData(schedule); setShowForm(true); }; const handleDelete = (id) => { setScheduleList(scheduleList.filter(item => item.id !== id)); }; const handleCancel = () => { setShowForm(false); setEditingSchedule(null); setScheduleData({ express: "", bus: "", date: "", departureTime: "", arrivalTime: "", availableSeats: "", price: "", status: "active" }); }; const handleAddNew = () => { history.push("/admin/schedules/add"); }; return ( <> {/* Schedules Management */}

Schedules Management

{showForm && (

{editingSchedule ? "Edit Schedule" : "Add New Schedule"}

)}

Schedules List

{scheduleList.map((schedule) => ( ))}
Express Bus Date Departure Arrival Seats Price Status Actions
{schedule.express} {schedule.bus} {schedule.date} {schedule.departureTime} {schedule.arrivalTime} {schedule.availableSeats} RWF {schedule.price} {schedule.status}
); }
